title: Directors of the EBRD
snippet: He has overall responsibility for the effective delivery of EBRD investments and advisory activities in the Bank’s countries of operation, in addition to contributing to the delivery of EBRD policy engagement activities. Mr Patrone previously held the post of Managing Director, Eastern Europe ...

title: 2020 election of the EBRD President
snippet: The EBRD's Board of Governors elected Odile Renaud-Basso as President to succeed Sir Suma Chakrabarti in October 2020.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the current President of the Bank. The President manages the work of the Bank under the guidance of the Board of Directors. ... The EBRD is owned by 77 countries, the European Union and the European Investment Bank.

title: Matteo Patrone
snippet: He has overall responsibility for the effective delivery of EBRD investments and advisory activities in the Bank’s countries of operation, in addition to contributing to the delivery of EBRD policy engagement activities. Mr Patrone previously held the post of Managing Director, Eastern Europe ...

title: Former EBRD President Sir Suma Chakrabarti
snippet: Sir Suma Chakrabarti was President of the Bank from 2012-2020.
